events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred downtown with moderate damage to the front bumper and windshield.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on the keywords identified and the description provided.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the claimant's auto accident case to ensure prompt assistance.
The claimant received official acknowledgment of their auto accident claim submission and next steps were outlined.
The customer was asked to provide police reports, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and a repair estimate.
All requested documents including photos and official reports were submitted by the claimant within the deadline.
Claim investigation commenced focusing on verifying the extent of vehicle damage and fault determination.
Investigation concluded and liability was confirmed with a thorough review of all submitted evidences.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs and provisional rental car expenses.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the clarity and fairness of the settlement proposal.
Claim approval was finalized after confirming all conditions were met and customer consent obtained.
The settlement payment was issued directly to the repair shop and rental agency as per agreement.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after confirmation of repair completion and customer satisfaction.
